channel.description: printf Function As you’ve seen, the printf function is used to display output in C. For example, to display a string of text: printf("Hello\n");Note that you always need to specify the newline character (\n). There is no println equivalent in C. Printing Variables Printing variables works a bit differently. First, you specify the kind of variable that’s going to be printed (called a control string). Then, outside the string, you give the corresponding variable name.
